stickyText.title: Project Manager
stickyText.body:
"it was a good 
 opportunity to learn how 
 to collaborate with
 different roles and
 teammates with various
 skill backgrounds"

stickyText.title: UX Designer
stickyText.body:
“...it really gave me a 
realistic taste of what 
being a designer is truly 
like... I now know what 
to do in the future”

stickyText.title: Visual Designer
stickyText.body:
“this was my first real 
design project that I’ve 
worked on and it was 
such a memorable
 experience.”

stickyText.title: UX Researcher
stickyText.body:
“My favorite part of the 
program was the 
collaborative work with 
other team members for
 the project in addition to
 the hands on
 experience.”

stickyText.title:
Product
 Marketing
Manager
stickyText.body:
“I had a pretty pleasant
 experience overall. I
 gained some valuable
 experience in team work
 and marketing.”

stickyText.title: Software Engineer
stickyText.body:
“I really liked the
 flexibility we were given
 and the aspect of having
 mentors because they
 were incredibly helpful
 whenever we needed
 feedback or advice.”
